front.title: Applicability analysis of GMPLS protocols to Layer 1 Virtual Private Networks

abstract.t: This document provides an applicability analysis on the use of Generalized Multiprotocol Label Switching (GMPLS) protocols and mechanisms to satisfy the requirements of Layer 1 Virtual Private Networks (L1VPNs). In addition, this document identifies areas where additional protocol extensions or procedures are needed to satisfy the requirements of L1VPNs, and provides guidelines for potential extensions.
